alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Chouteau; Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:41PM MDT until August 04 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fergus County in central Montana... Southern Blaine County in north central Montana... East central Chouteau County in north central Montana... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 340 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 19 miles north of Winifred to 24 miles southeast of Lewistown, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Winifred, Grass Range, Hays, Roy, Fergus, Forestgrove, Fred Robinson Bridge, Lodge Pole, Suffolk, Giltedge, Judith Landing, Hilger, Heath and Christina. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
